Supreme Seer Eli:
You are now ready to move to the Altar of Triol! The demon Triol will try to subjugate anyone he can, controlling their actions. The number of participants in the Triol Mirror ritual is determined by the number of Triol Revelations. Don't miss them - remember to look around! To avoid being caught off guard by Triol's warriors, remember: 1 Triol Revelation marks 10 people. Be vigilant!
